languages.text: "Люди! Немезит — людоед! На костях спит, человечину ест, я сам видел! Мы с блюстителями воюем, а он под шумок наши трупы глодает".
"People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."
languages.original_text: "Люди! Немезит — людоед! На костях спит, человечину ест, я сам видел! Мы с блюстителями воюем, а он под шумок наши трупы глодает".

traits.locale_text: "People! Nemesite is a menace! He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh, I've seen it myself! While we are fighting the enforcers, he is gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."
"People! Nemesite is a menace! He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh, I've seen it myself! While we are fighting the enforcers, he is gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."

"People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."

languages.text: "Leute! Dieser Nemesit ist eine Bedrohung. Er schläft auf Knochen und verschlingt Menschenfleisch. Ich habe es selbst gesehen! Während wir die Enforcer bekämpft haben, kaut er auf den Gliedmaßen unserer Gefallenen herum."
languages.original_text: "People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."

traits.locale_text: "Leute! Dieser Nemesit ist eine Bedrohung. Er schläft auf Knochen und verschlingt Menschenfleisch. Ich habe es selbst gesehen! Während wir die Enforcer bekämpft haben, kaut er auf den Gliedmaßen unserer Gefallenen herum."

languages.text: «¡Gente! Ese tal Nemesitio es una amenaza. Duerme sobre un lecho de huesos y come carne humana. ¡Lo he visto con mis propios ojos! Mientras nosotros luchamos contra los guardias, él se dedica a roer los cuerpos de nuestros muertos».
languages.original_text: "People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."

traits.locale_text: «¡Gente! Ese tal Nemesitio es una amenaza. Duerme sobre un lecho de huesos y come carne humana. ¡Lo he visto con mis propios ojos! Mientras nosotros luchamos contra los guardias, él se dedica a roer los cuerpos de nuestros muertos».

languages.text: 「みんな！ネメサイトは脅威だ。奴は骨の上で眠り、人間の肉をむさぼり食う。この目で見た！私たちがエンフォーサーと戦っている間に、奴は倒れた者の手足をかじっていたんだ」
languages.original_text: "People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."

traits.locale_text: 「みんな！ネメサイトは脅威だ。奴は骨の上で眠り、人間の肉をむさぼり食う。この目で見た！私たちがエンフォーサーと戦っている間に、奴は倒れた者の手足をかじっていたんだ」

languages.text: “我没骗人！这个涅墨斯特是个怪物！他吃人肉，拿人骨头当床睡，都是我亲眼看到的！我们在外面和那群执法者拼命的时候，他却在忙着吃战死同伴的血肉。”
languages.original_text: "People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."

traits.locale_text: “我没骗人！这个涅墨斯特是个怪物！他吃人肉，拿人骨头当床睡，都是我亲眼看到的！我们在外面和那群执法者拼命的时候，他却在忙着吃战死同伴的血肉。”

languages.text: « Braves gens, ce Némésite est une menace ! Il dort sur un lit d'ossements et il se nourrit de chair humaine. Je l'ai vu de mes yeux ! Pendant qu'on est occupés à se battre contre les prévôts, il se repaît des cadavres de nos morts ! »
languages.original_text: "People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."

traits.locale_text: « Braves gens, ce Némésite est une menace ! Il dort sur un lit d'ossements et il se nourrit de chair humaine. Je l'ai vu de mes yeux ! Pendant qu'on est occupés à se battre contre les prévôts, il se repaît des cadavres de nos morts ! »

languages.text: "Millet! Nemezit canidir. Yatağını kemikten yapar, insan etiyle karnını doyurur. Kendi gözlerimle gördüm! İnfazcılarla çatıştığımız sırada can veren kardeşlerimizin uzuvlarını kemiriyordu."
languages.original_text: "People! This Nemesite is a menace. He sleeps on bones and devours human flesh. I've seen it myself! While we're away fighting the enforcers, he's just gnawing on the limbs of our fallen."
